title: Watching your main get changed on the PBE like

replies.body: I prefer rainbow dash over the rest. I like her tomboyishness.

i like her... well yea rainbow lol. but fluttershy is so cute.

also i have 4 upvotes woot, i thought i get hate because i know their names lol.

I've had 3 mains reworked. I had strong stylistic objections to one, but other than that, didn't bother me... even though those reworks had every OTHER sej, fiora, and quinn player screaming their champs sucked for all eternity now that they were somehow incapable of playing someone with slight modifications. Honestly... this meme... right here... only it gets even worse AFTER the rework comes in.
